data.title: Westfield High School
data.meta_description: Westfield is for Aviation Lovers by Marina Brito & Maggie Altomare, Realtor®, Westfield High School Boundary Specialist The Westfield HS boundary is located on the western part of Fairfax Co
data.text:
Westfield is for Aviation Lovers

by Marina Brito & Maggie Altomare, Realtor®, Westfield High School Boundary Specialist

The Westfield HS boundary is located on the western part of Fairfax County, sharing its borders with Loudoun County. The Westfield boundary covers a long area, from parts of Herndon, VA to Centreville, VA.

To the West of the boundary you can find the Washington Dulles International Airport (IAD) and the Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center which houses the exciting Smithsonian National Air and Space Museum.

About the Westfield HS boundary

What’s great

Westfield HS is the newest high school to have opened in Fairfax County (in 2000)

Easy access to major employment centers (Reston, Dulles Airport)

The amazing Air and Space Museum is just a few minutes away

Commuting bus routes are convenient to the BRAND NEW Silver line of the Metro

Many single family homes have large lots at County-average prices

What you should know

Traffic through Rt. 28 can be a challenge at certain times

Public transportation options are limited for non-commuters

Some schools’ scores are lower than in surrounding highly-competitive boundaries

Why move here

Highly-Rated Schools

Silver line of the Metro (Now Open!) near the North end of the boundary

Plenty of amenities available (parks, museums, golf courses)

More living space at affordable prices

Schools in the Westfield High School Boundary

The Westfield boundary is the attendance area for highly-rated Westfield High School, Stone Middle School, and 7 feeder elementary schools.

Westfield High School – home of the Bulldogs – is the newest high school in Fairfax County, with state-of-the-art technology and labs; and even an Aerospace Academy Pilot Program.

Average of Standard of Learning (SOL) Pass Rates (June 2012)

School School Score Fairfax County Westfield High 91 89 Stone Middle 89 89

Elementary Schools

Cub Run Elementary 87 89 Deer Park Elementary 84 89 Floris Elementary 95 89 London Towne Elementary 86 89 Lutie Lewis Coates Elementary 83 89 McNair Elementary 93 89 Virginia Run Elementary 89 89

Homes in the Westfield High School Boundary

The Westfield Boundary offers an affordable variety of options for buying a single family home (either detached or townhome).

Last school year (2013-2014), over 450 homes sold within this boundary, with prices ranging from $365K to $2.9 Million. This is one of the few boundaries with affordable land – there are plenty of properties between 1 and 5 acres, with modern, large homes which have sold for around $1 Million or a little less.

There are almost an even amount of detached single family homes and townhomes available for sale; but relatively few condos. Due to its location on the Western-end of Fairfax County, home prices are consistent with the average price in Fairfax County.

SOLD Home prices (School year 2013-2014)

Home Type Low Average High Detached (179) $365K $609K $2.9M Townhome (235) $210K $364K $635K Condo (51) $185K $317K $410K

See all the homes for sale within this boundary

Finding a home by school can be a challenge

If you have tried to find a home by school before, you have probably found that it’s a challenge to cross-reference homes for sale on a typical home search website with their assigned school.

Simply finding homes “near” the school won’t do

The issue with typical home search websites is that they only display homes by city or zip code. Some of them display homes “near” the school. Well, that won’t do you any good since school boundaries span cities, zip codes, and just being “near” the school doesn’t mean that the home belongs to that boundary.

You want a home INSIDE the school boundary. Not just “near” it…

The good news is that we have put together the only interactive map where you can find homes for sale INSIDE the Westfield High School boundary. Plus, you can also see points of interest such as shopping and hospitals. Click to search:

Find homes for sale

(inside the Westfield HS Boundary)
